#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    long int t,r,v,x,x0,y,y0;
    double d;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld%ld%ld%ld%ld%ld",&r,&x,&y,&x0,&y0,&v);
        d=(double)r-sqrt(1.0*(x-x0)*(x-x0)+1.0*(y-y0)*(y-y0));
        d/=v;
        if(d<=0) printf("0.000000\n");
        else printf("%.6lf\n",d);
    }
    return 0;
}
